locals.author: GitHub User
locals.description: Write an awesome description for your new site here. You can edit this line in _config.yml. It will appear in your document head meta (for Google search results) and in your feed.xml site description.

partials.title: Entries tagged {{{tag}}} from {{{title}}}
partials.description: All of the entries posted on {{{title}}} tagged {{{tag}}}

partials.title: Index of {{{path}}}
partials.description: All the files and folders inside {{{path}}}

partials.title: Search - {{{title}}}
partials.description: Search all the entries posted on {{{title}}}
